articles.title: Hollywood s pivot to AI video has a prompting problem
articles.summary: It has become almost impossible to browse the internet without having an AI-generated video thrust upon you. Open basically any social media platform, and it won't be long until an uncanny-looking clip of a fake natural disaster or animals doing impossible things slides across your screen.
